titles.title: Impeaching Christopher Asher Wray, Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation, for facilitating the development of a Federal police force to intimidate, harass, and entrap American citizens that are deemed enemies of the Biden regime.

Impeaching Christopher Asher Wray, Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation, for facilitating the development of a Federal police force to intimidate, harass, and entrap American citizens that are deemed enemies of the Biden regime.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution impeaches Christopher Wray, Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation.
